text:
Champions League
OL - Benfica: the Lyonnais group
On the occasion of the match of the 4th day of the Champions League against Benfica, the coach of Olympique Lyonnais unveiled the names of the 18 players summoned.
04 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Charlie Creteur



A few days after their defeat in Lisbon (2-1), Lyonnais find Benfica on the occasion of the fourth day of the Champions League. Between these two confrontations, the players of Rudi Garcia scored 2 win sconsecutives in Ligue 1 against FC Metz (2-0) and Toulouse (2-3). On the eve of the match, the club announced the list of 18 players called. Thus, Tete, Terrier and Mar√ßal are not part of it because of injuries. Rayan Cherki is again present and therefore will not play the Youth League match.











The group of Lyonnais to face Benfica




Rudi Garcia + 15 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

OL: Lopes - Tatarusanu - Kon√© - Rafael - Andersen - Denayer - Marcelo - Dubois - Aouar - Allart - Mendes - Queen Adelaide - Lucas - Cherki - Dembele - Traore - Memphis - Cornet
